alert.note: Alert for Chase; Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 1:49PM CDT until June 09 at 8:17AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Plymouth. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, More sections along Road A floods especially at the low water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 29.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 33.5 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Cottonwood River Plymouth 32.0 29.0 Sun 1 pm CDT 33.1 33.4 32.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
